alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 3:11AM PST until December 12 at 10:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST MONDAY ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow and strong southwest to west winds expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 10 inches. * WHERE...San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 PM Sunday to 10 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southwest to west winds of 20 to 35 mph with gusts to 50 to 60 mph. Light snow is possible on Interstate 8 in the mountains east of San Diego Monday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
